aboutUs.headerSubtitle: Streamlining the Start of Scientific Research
aboutUs.missionTitle: Our Mission: Optimizing Your Academic Research Time
aboutUs.value1Description: Simultaneous search across various academic libraries and databases from a single, intuitive interface.
aboutUs.value1Benefit: Benefit: Fewer clicks, broader coverage. Find everything you need without leaving the application.
aboutUs.value2Description: Advanced deduplication algorithms that detect and flag identical records, even if sourced from different locations.
aboutUs.value2Benefit: Benefit: Integrity and time saving. Ensure your article list is clean and unique.
aboutUs.value3Description: Support for building complex queries and efficient results management.
aboutUs.value3Benefit: Benefit: Focus and Precision. Refine your search to find exactly what is relevant to your topic.
aboutUs.value4Description: The application is developed using Electron, offering the stability and speed of a native desktop application, combined with the flexibility of web technology.
aboutUs.value4Benefit: Benefit: Stable Performance. A fast and reliable user experience.
aboutUs.academicTitle: Developed at ISEC: Rigor and Innovation
aboutUs.academicContext: This software project was conceived and implemented as part of the Project Curricular Unit of the Master's in Informatic Engineering at the Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Coimbra (ISEC).
aboutUs.academicQuote: Our Goal: The development of this application served as a practical challenge to apply advanced software engineering methodologies, resulting in a tool that offers a real and tangible contribution to the research community.
aboutUs.ctaText: As UniSearchAcademy is your desktop research application, you are already ready to use the power of unified search. If you have questions, suggestions, or wish to report a problem, use our feedback channels available in the application's Help menu.
